Black Sheep: Ostracized by magocratic nobility
Connections: May call in favors from acquaintance or organization
God Cursed+: Beneficial spells from god's cleric fail, harmful spells do +2 damage and negate arcane resistance

Magic Forbiddance+: Cannot use or detect magic items
Natural Realms: Treats Elfhomes as wilds
Orders: Takes orders from outside power
